([[Calgary]]; [[Canada]]; January 12, 2008) | World champ2 name = [[IIHF World Women's U18 Championships]] | World champ2 apps = 4 | World champ2 first = 2008 | World champ2 best = [[Image:Med 1.png]] ([[2010 IIHF World Women's U18 Championship|2010]]) | Record = 17-3-0 }} {{MedalTop2}} {{MedalSport|[[IIHF World Women's U18 Championships]]}} {{MedalSilver |[[2008 IIHF World Women's U18 Championship|2008 Canada]]|Canada}} {{MedalSilver |[[2009 IIHF World Women's U18 Championship|2009 Germany]]|Canada}} {{MedalGold |[[2010 IIHF World Women's U18 Championship|2010 USA]]|Canada}} {{MedalSilver |[[2011 IIHF World Women's U18 Championship|2011 Sweden]]|Canada}} {{MedalBottom}} The '''Canadian women's national under 18 ice hockey team''' is the national under-18 [[ice hockey]] team in [[Canada]]. The team represents Canada at the [[International Ice Hockey Federation]]'s [[IIHF World Women's U18 Championships]]. ==World Women's U18 Championship record== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! GP !
